subject-English: Online performance is measured through data analytics sporadically.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用數據分析評估線上通路的效益。

subject-English: Data analytics is considered to be a key competitive advantage.
題目-Chinese: 公司認為數據分析是關鍵的競爭優勢。

subject-English: Data analytics is sponsored across every function within the business.
題目-Chinese: 公司以跨部門的合作模式推動數據分析。

subject-English: Data analytics and online performance measurement is managed and executed as isolated test and learn initiatives.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析和線上績效評量是以獨立測試和學習機制進行管理與執行。

subject-English: Data analytics is implicit across the organisation and part of the business's DNA.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析已深植於公司組織內部及文化中。

subject-English: New initiatives, recommendations and supporting business cases are founded from the digital analytics capability.
題目-Chinese: 公司運用分析能力進行創新數位計畫與提案，並支援業務發展。

subject-English: The business's data analytics and online measurement informs the business strategy.
題目-Chinese: 公司依據數據分析結果為制定業務策略的基礎。

subject-English: There is no set governance framework around how data analytics is used.
題目-Chinese: 公司對於數據分析運用方式並無制式框架或限制。

subject-English: Data analytics capability and performance is tracked based on ROI.
題目-Chinese: 公司以投資報酬率來衡量數據分析的能力與表現

subject-English: There is mandatory investment budget in place to ensure the business's data analytics capability is continually best in class.
題目-Chinese: 公司持續投入預算與資源，以確保數據分析的領先地位。

subject-English: The data analytics team are seen as a support team rather than a strategic business team.
題目-Chinese: 公司的數據分析團隊被視為後勤支援單位而非業務策略單位。

subject-English: Data analytics is viewed as a core capability required to deliver the business digital objectives.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析被視為達成數位目標的核心能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is viewed as a core capability required to keep the business competitive.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析被視為確保業務競爭力的核心能力。

subject-English: The data analytics team is seen as the agent for change within the organisation.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析團隊為擔負組織內變革的主要角色。

subject-English: Data analytics is focused on improving marketing campaigns online.
題目-Chinese: 公司運用數據分析結果進行執行中行銷活動優化。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to improve and personalise the customer experience and the digital proposition.
題目-Chinese: 公司運用數據分析進行客戶個人化體驗優化及調整。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to improve the customer experience and relevance across all products and channels.
題目-Chinese: 公司運用數據分析進行跨產品及通路的客戶體驗優化。

subject-English: Data analytics is viewed as the core capability to revolutionise the business.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析被視為確保業務創新改革的核心能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is only used to fulfil specific and ad hoc queries from senior management.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析的結果僅用於滿足高階主管的特定需求。

subject-English: Data analysis outcomes are overruled or ignored if they do not support existing direction or opinions.
題目-Chinese: 當與目前的業務方向不一致時，數據分析結果將被否決或忽略。

subject-English: The data analytics team tend to only focus on analysing specific online activity.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析團隊往往僅專注於特定線上活動的分析。

subject-English: Data analytics is used across the whole organisation.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析在公司組織內被廣泛運用。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to drive efficiencies across the digital business.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析被運用於數位業務效率的提升。

subject-English: Data analytics us used to better integrate online and offline units.
題目-Chinese: 公司透過數據分析協助整合線上與線下的業務單位應用。

subject-English: Data analytics is carried out on products and channels independently of each other.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析被分別運用於產品或通路上。

subject-English: The business does not have dedicated analytics resource in place to undertake analytics.
題目-Chinese: 公司業務單位沒有專責數據分析的人力。

subject-English: Analytics resource is spread across the organisation with no single line of responsibility.
題目-Chinese: 進行數據分析的人力散布於組織內部，但無專責單位負責。

subject-English: Data analytics resource are empowered to make decisions and drive change off the back of insight.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析人員能根據分析結果進行決策並且推動改革。

subject-English: Data analytics resource are multi-disciplined, with a structure in place to effectively support analysis requirements across the whole business.
題目-Chinese: 公司擁有全方位的數據分析人力資源，並能滿足內部全面性的數據分析需求。

subject-English: Data analytics is structured for tactical and ad-hoc requests.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析能夠提供為特定目定的策略規劃。

subject-English: There are clear roles and responsibilities for the data analytics team.
題目-Chinese: 數據分析團隊有明確的角色與職責劃分。

subject-English: The data analytics team are performance managed against clear objectives.
題目-Chinese: 公司以績效導向管理數據分析團隊，而非僅給予目標。

subject-English: The organisation outsources or uses out of the box web analytics capability to monitor performance.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用創新的分析工具監控網路績效。

subject-English: Structured processes are in place to execute A/B testing and analytics.
題目-Chinese: 公司以標準作業流程進行比較測試(A/B testing)與分析。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to track and monitor activity performance by cost and ROI.
題目-Chinese: 公司藉著對成本及投資報酬率進行數據分析，以追蹤和監控業務表現。

subject-English: Data analytics is carried out using multiple integrated sources of data.
題目-Chinese: 公司整合多元的資料來源進行數據分析。

subject-English: There is the capability to carry our predictive analytics.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有預測分析的能力。

subject-English: There is the ability to carry out analysis to understand the individual lifetime value of their customers.
題目-Chinese: 公司具有應用數據分析預測客戶未來帶來價值的能力。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to optimise online marketing campaigns.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用數據分析優化線上行銷活動。

subject-English: Dashboards are used to effectively communicate the outcomes of data analysis.
題目-Chinese: 公司使用數位儀表板有效呈現數據分析的結果。

subject-English: Data analytics is used to carry out behavioural targeting and personalisation.
題目-Chinese: 公司透過數據分析進行客戶行為分類並客製化服務。
